trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around April 11th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailson april 11th 2012 at 1015pm while sitting in my car near passmore and steeles in the north east part of scarborough i noticed a cigar shaped object it was very bright with what looked like 5 smaller lights on the top of it. it was not moving and made no sound i took a pic of it with my i pod . i later fond out that a very simular object was the cause of an airport shutdown for over 4 hours at the xiaoshan airport in china on the 8th of july 2010. if you wish to see the pic you may contact me as i do not know hope to place it here in this report.
Summary: bright cigar shaped object with 5 lights on the top
